data.text: @anandmahindra Hope NO meat on the menu and the milk surely is not Ahimsa so not keen. I only consume milk products in ISKCON bc the milk products there are from their own goshalas where cows are taken  good care of i hope?
@anandmahindra @singhkavinder Okay so after cheating you employees how can a person be in peace may I know? More than 3 months are still fnf not cleared.
@anandmahindra Sir, did you visit Mahindra showroom at Tumakuru also ?
@anandmahindra Sir eagerly waiting to taste coffee. Would not mind driving from Coimbatore to Bengaluru.

@anandmahindra I am very impressed with you Anand sir, I want to meet you, the praise for you and Ratan Tata sir is less. I like your company car very much, I can try I will buy your car https://t.co/7dogSwAGtN
